Package org.hypergraphdb.viewer

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GraphView.SelectionListener
    Listens to selection changes
    ObjectInspector.PropNodeFactory
    Factory interface for creating PropNode for given class
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionManager
    Singleton class containing actions used in menuBar, toolBar and pop-up menus
    ActionManager.BackgroundColorAction
    Prompts User for New Background Color.
    ActionManager.BirdsEyeViewAction
    Toggles BirdsEyeView in the stand-alone version of HGViewer
    ActionManager.CreateHGViewerAction
    Creates a new HGViewer and adds it in the TabbdePane in the stand-alone version of HGViewer
    ActionManager.DestroyHGViewerAction
    Destroys a HGViewer and removes it from the TabbdePane in the stand-alone version of HGViewer
    ActionManager.ExitAction
    Exit action.
    ActionManager.ExportAction
    Exports current HGViewer to one of the predefined formats.
    ActionManager.FitContentAction
    Zooms the current view appropriately to fit in the viewable area.
    ActionManager.HideSelectedAction
    Hides selected nodes and edges.
    ActionManager.HideSelectedEdgesAction
    Hides selected edges.
    ActionManager.HideSelectedNodesAction
    Hides selected nodes.
    ActionManager.LayoutAction
    Applies the preferred layout to current HGViewer
    ActionManager.NewWindowSelectedNodesEdgesAction
    Creates a new HGViewer containing the selected nodes and edges from the current one
    ActionManager.NewWindowSelectedNodesOnlyAction
    Creates a new HGViewer containing the selected nodes from the current one
    ActionManager.PreferenceAction
    Opens up the settings dialog
    ActionManager.PrintAction
    Prints the current HGViewer
    ActionManager.SelectAllAction
    Selects all nodes and edges in the current HGViewer
    ActionManager.SelectAllEdgesAction
    Selects all edges in the current HGViewer
    ActionManager.SelectAllNodesAction
    Selects all nodes in the current HGViewer
    ActionManager.SelectFirstNeighborsAction
    Selects first neighbors of the currently selected node
    ActionManager.SelectPrefLayoutAction
    Sets the preferred layout
    ActionManager.SetVisualPropertiesAction
    Displays the dialog for visual settings
    ActionManager.ZoomAction
    Zooms the current HGViewer
    ActionManager.ZoomSelectedAction
    Zooms and centers the selected nodes in the current HGViewer
    AppConfig
    Singleton class used for persisting various configuration options
    ContextMenuHelper
    The Piccolo handler responsible for showing popup(context) menu
    FEdge
    Foundation class in the HGViewer model representing an "edge" e.g.
    FNode
    Foundation class in the HGViewer model representing a given node described by its HGHandle in the HyperGraphDB
    GraphView
    GraphView is the main Piccolo component which displays the graph on the screen using PNodeView and PEdgeView instances to visually represent nodes and edges.
    GraphViewU
    Utility operations for selection and hiding/unhiding nodes and edges in a GraphView.
    HGVDesktop
    Represents the main viewer Frame and contains the main[] method used to start the standalone version of the viewer.
    HGViewer
    Swing Component for displaying HyperGraphDB atoms and links.
    HGViewerType  
    HGVKit
    Abstract class containing common methods, constants and event handling for wiring the desktop version of HGViewer
    HGVMenus
    This class creates the menu and tool bars for the HGVDesktop.
    NetworkPanel
    Desktop Viewer Only.
    ObjectInspector
    Swing component for inspecting the fields of a given object in a tree table as in most common GUI debuggers.
    ObjectInspector.PropNode
    A node in the tree table representing a given object field alongside its name, value and child nodes.
    VisualManager
    Singleton responsible for management of visual styles.
